biography_text: OLSON, Pete, a Representative from Texas; born in Fort Lewis, Pierce County, Wash., December 9, 1962; graduated from Clear Lake High School, Houston, Tex.; B.A., Rice University, Houston, Tex., 1985; J.D., University of Texas School of Law, Austin, Tex., 1988; United States Navy, 1988-1997; United States Naval Reserve, 1998-2009; staff, United States Senator William Philip (Phil) Gramm of Texas, 1998-2002; staff, United States Senator John Cornyn of Texas, 2002-2007; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eleventh and to the four succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2009-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of Texas School of Law, Austin, Tex.
